experiments.stimuli: The positive electrode or terminal of a device.
What is acceptor atoms?
In some languages, articles are a special part of speech, which cannot easily be combined with other parts of speech.
Er hat eine ältere Schwester, die eine Profi-Basketballspielerin ist.
Mon père jouerais le foot contre leur équipe de football.
新中心把教育、研究和临床治疗服务结合在一起，将促进不同领域的专科人士之间的合作，增加更多跨领域的研究工作。

What is band-pass filter? A tuned circuit designed to pass a band of frequencies between a lower cut-off frequency (f1) and a higher cut-off frequency (f2). Frequencies above and below the pass band are heavily attenuated.
What is AC coupling? Circuit that passes an AC signal while blocking a DC voltage.

In languages that employ articles, every common noun, with some exceptions, is expressed with a certain definiteness, just as many languages express every noun with a certain grammatical number. Every noun must be accompanied by the article, if any, corresponding to its definiteness, and the lack of an article (considered a zero article) itself specifies a certain definiteness. This is in contrast to other adjectives and determiners, which are typically optional. This obligatory nature of articles makes them among the most common words in many languages - in English, for example, the most frequent word is the.

Groß, freundlich, erfolgreich, und bescheiden: Mit diesen Worten kann man ganz genau den Power Forward der Dallas Mavericks beschreiben. Dirk Nowitzki, der Power Forward und erster Europäer, der die NBA MVP gewann, wurde am 19. Juni 1978 geboren. In Würzburg verbrachte Dirk seine Jugend. Er hat eine ältere Schwester, die eine Profi-Basketballspielerin ist.
Mon College Je m'appelle Amy Vincent, j'ai 14 ans et je vais à Beal High School, à Ilford. Cependant, je n'habite pas dans Ilford, ma maison est à une demi-heure de l'ecole.
这是卫生部为了照顾到老化的人口所需的口腔卫生服务所推出的新项目之一。新中心也将为由特殊需求的病患，包括多重疾病患者提供牙科服务。
